1. \( E[Y|X=x] = x \)
2. \( \text{Var}(Y|X=x) = x \)

Using the law of total variance:
\[
\text{Var}(Y) = E[\text{Var}(Y|X)] + \text{Var}(E[Y|X])
\]

\[
E[\text{Var}(Y|X)] = E[X] = 1
\]
\[
\text{Var}(E[Y|X]) = \text{Var}(X) = 1
\]

\[
\text{Var}(Y) = 1 + 1 = 2
